_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
dn33:1.7.4+dn33:3.3.89^who_else_mentione: Buddha, the Blessed One, Brahmā, Saṅgha, Aviha, Akaniṭṭha, Buddhas, the Holy One
before^dn33:3.4.2^who_around: The Saṅgha of mendicants, The Mallas of Pāvā
before^dn33:3.4.2^who_mentioned: Nigaṇṭha Nātaputta, Jain ascetics, The Buddha
before^dn33:3.4.2^where: Pāvā, Cunda the smith's mango grove, Ubbhaṭaka town hall
where: Pāvā, Cunda the smith's mango grove, Ubbhaṭaka town hall
